*******
# 5P004-211234_B Parks Canada - Outdoor Furniture

## Solicitation Information
### Reference Number
WS2979279551-Doc3922495006

### Solicitation Number
WS2979279551

### Amendment Number
5

### Publication Date
2023-03-20

### Tender Closing Date
2023-05-12T14:00:00

### Amendment Date
2023-04-27

### Expected Contract Start Date
2023-08-01

### Expected Contract End Date
2023-07-31

## Notice Type
Request for Standing Offer

## Procurement Category
Goods and Services (GD)

## Regions of Opportunity
Canada (NONE)

## Regions of Delivery
Canada

## Item Classification
*Outdoor tables or picnic tables
*Outdoor benches
*Bicycle racks*

## Trade Agreements
Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA) among others.

## Solicitation Description
Parks Canada is seeking supply of outdoor furniture at various locations. This Solicitation is issued under the Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) format and includes detailed requirements. The contract will be distributed on an 'as and when requested' basis.

## End-User Entities
Parks Canada's various locations across Canada.

## Contact Information
Christopher Finigan, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
christopher.finnigan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Notice URL
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15750154?extsite=MTU3NTAxNTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Registration
Access the full RFSO and attachments through your registered SAP Ariba account, or register for one here.
